DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study determine exercise , fasting , eat prior molecular breast imaging study effect uptake tracer breast tissue .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Effect Fasting Exercise Uptake Tc-99m Sestamibi Breast Tissue
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study determine exercise , fasting , eat prior molecular breast imaging study effect uptake radiotracer Tc-99m sestamibi breast tissue . Tc-99m sestamibi primarily extract liver . Changes hepatic blood flow may therefore influence amount radiotracer available uptake breast tissue .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Arm 1 : 1 . Able fast overnight 6 hour 2 . Nondiabetic 3 . Age > 40 year 4 . Negative pregnancy test , postmenopausal , surgically sterilize 5 . Negative mammogram Mayo Clinic within last 15 month ( define screen mammogram subsequent diagnostic workup BIRADS 1 2 final assessment ) 6.No current breast concern Arm 2 : 1 . Able fast overnight 6 hour 2 . Able perform light moderate exercise exercise bike 3 . Nondiabetic Body Mass Index < 25 4 . Age > 40 year < 70 year 5 . Negative pregnancy test , postmenopausal , surgically sterilize 6 . Negative mammogram Mayo Clinic within last 15 month ( define screen mammogram subsequent diagnostic workup BIRADS 1 2 final assessment ) 7 . No current breast concern 8 . No history coronary artery disease , angina , stroke peripheral arterial disease . Arm 3 : 1 . Able fast overnight 6 hour 2 . Willing consume dose caffeine ( 200 mg ) , equivalent 8 oz Starbuck brew coffee . 3 . Nondiabetic 4 . Age > 40 year 5 . Negative pregnancy test , postmenopausal , surgically sterilize 6 . Negative mammogram Mayo Clinic within last 15 month ( define screen mammogram subsequent diagnostic workup BIRADS 1 2 final assessment ) 7 . No current breast concern Arm 4 : 1 . Able fast overnight 6 hour 2 . Nondiabetic 3 . Age > 40 year 4 . Negative pregnancy test , postmenopausal , surgically sterilize 5 . Negative mammogram Mayo Clinic within last 15 month ( define screen mammogram subsequent diagnostic workup BIRADS 1 2 final assessment ) 6 . No current breast concern Pregnancy test ( necessary ) negative , patient unable complete pregnancy test Physically unable sit upright still remain still two consecutive MBI study course 2 hour period . Have undergone unilateral bilateral mastectomy Breast implant silicone injection Are unable understand sign consent form Arm 2also include : Unable perform light moderate exercise 12 minute treadmill stationary bicycle Arm 3 : Unwilling consume 200 mg dose caffeine
